title: Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 26, 2011

 



Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate





NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE:

	Robert S. Mueller, III, of California, to be Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation for a term expiring September 4, 2013.Â  (Reappointment)
